ResearchProjectDef.label: Wax Refinement
ResearchProjectDef.description: Base wax is wood-like in quality. As nice as it is for hives, it's not gonna hold up well in the long term. Enables the production of hardy wax, a stony wax, and shiny wax, a metallic wax, using specific pollen types and regular beeswax.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Prismtech
ResearchProjectDef.description: It is said that a hive once reached space age technology, and was inspired into creating a brand new plant to control light itself. Allows the cultivation of the Prism Lotus, and enables the production of Prismtech.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Thermal Tempering
ResearchProjectDef.description: With emberose and frostbell, a whole new world of thermal possibilities opens up. Enables the production of heat and cold based weapons and security.
